name: Bounded Retransmission Protocol
author: Arnd Hartmanns <a.hartmanns@utwente.nl>
description: A Modest PTA model of the bounded retransmission protocol [1], combining the previous untimed [2] and non-probabilistic [3] models. It models the transmission of one file from a sender to a receiver in `N´ chunks. The number of retransmissions per file is bounded by `MAX´, and the transmission delay of the probabilistic lossy channels between sender and receiver is `TD´.

parameters.name: MAX
parameters.description: Maximum number of retransmissions per frame

properties.name: T_1
properties.description: The maximum probability that there is more than one message in transit for each channel. Should be zero.

properties.name: T_2
properties.description: The maximum probability that there is more than one message in transit in total. Should be zero.

properties.name: T_A1
properties.description: The maximum probability of premature timeout. Should be zero.

properties.name: T_A2
properties.description: The maximum probability that the sender starts a new file before the receiver reacted to failure. Should be zero.

properties.name: P_A
properties.description: The maximum probability that eventually the sender reports a certain unsuccessful transmission but the receiver got the complete file. Should be zero.

properties.name: P_B
properties.description: The maximum probability that eventually the sender reports a certain successful transmission but the receiver did not get the complete file. Should be zero.

properties.name: P_1
properties.description: The maximum probability that eventually the sender does not report a successful transmission.

properties.name: P_2
properties.description: The maximum probability that eventually the sender reports an uncertainty on the success of the transmission.

properties.name: P_3
properties.description: The maximum probability that eventually the sender reports an unsuccessful transmission after more than 8 chunks have been sent successfully.

properties.name: P_4
properties.description: The maximum probability that eventually the receiver does not receive any chunk and the sender tried to send a chunk.

properties.name: Dmax
properties.description: The maximum probability that the sender reports a successful transmission within `TIME_BOUND´ time units.

properties.name: Dmin
properties.description: The minimum probability that the sender reports a successful transmission within `TIME_BOUND´ time units.

properties.name: Emax
properties.description: The maximum expected time until the transfer of the first file is finished (successfully or unsuccessfully).

properties.name: Emin
properties.description: The minimum expected time until the transfer of the first file is finished (successfully or unsuccessfully).
